channel.title: Corrupted-pk project F2P style
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/tasnb6.png[/img]
hello I am currently working on my a new project [b]corrupted-pk[/b] (keep in mind this is going to be pvp & pvm + economy) it's a free to play with [b]some[/b] members items
we have added: -corrupt dragon weapons not armour (extremely rare npc drop or Donate for it.) -tok-haar-kal cape you recieve once you get a 25 Killstreak -Dungeoneering tab is pking stats & achievements (KDR, achievement list, Kills & Deaths and current killstreak) -sara/zammy/guthix armour (gives you 15/13/10 str bonus in order from sara to guthix [best armour is saradomin]) recieve from donating. -rune armour you get from drops from lesser demons - 0.05 drop rate on each piece. -Grand exchange PVP [Closed off gate to go in and out] - only way in is teleporting (added pvp drops only in GE) -added Gauntlents bronze to rune only -Strength amulet(t) [gives 15 str bonus] and Magic amulet(t) [gives 12 mage bonus] and glory(t) gives [b]only[/b] [u]range bonus[/u] -piety & smite is added [b]I know its members only[/b] but its all good:P -perfect combat with new hit markers [b]and MORE...[/b]
[b]heres some pictures on items (more will be added later on)[/b]
Dungeoneering tab is pking stats & achievements (KDR, achievement list, Kills & Deaths) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34ec9d4.png[/img]
working corrupt weapons but doesnt degrade. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23uyk4l.png[/img]
tok-haar-kal cape you recieve after 25 killstreak [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vcgoev.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]grand exchange pvp is currently finished 100% - coded by me.[/b][/size]
theres a lot more, i wanted to see what you guys thought so far before i put anymore work into this if you think there should be more to be added just comment below:P
[size=24pt]theres a few glitches i have to fix with pvp before i release it:P[/size]
and if you think i should add something I would appreciate it, i'm adding better range items right know i added -zammy/sara/guthix range armour example: guthix chaps

item.title: Corrupted-pk project F2P style
item.dc:creator: @ottkid2 ottkid2
item.description:
@ottkid2 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:11, topic:435032”][quote author=ottkid2 link=topic=537751.msg3932835#msg3932835 date=1330822978]

iv never seen a server like this lol i will add some more pics soon

Name me one thing that this server has that others don’t.

um A grand exchange pvp, f2p style with new rs items and most servers dont have working killstreak rewards with achievement list.
o wait you only wanted one I forgot.
and if you think theres anything that would make it better in your opinion, i would appreciate it.

What is a “grand exchange pvp”
& new items and achievements are some of the things that made rs to complete shit

sorry but are you mentally challanged, grand exchange area thats closed off and the outside of main area of ge is pvp, the achievements runescape doesnt have its, pvp achievements so fuck off lmfao, asshole.
[/quote]
grand exchange area thats closed off and the outside of main area of ge is pvp,

Like the rs pvp worlds?
[size=6pt]ive been gone so long from rs[/size][/quote]
runescape doesnt have a closed off gate, i added 2 gate objects then close off, only inside grand exchange is pvp and only there, there is wilderness though. its kind of like camelot but f2p and 100x better lol

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted-pk project F2P style
item.dc:creator: @ottkid2 ottkid2
item.description:
@ottkid2 wrote:

                                                                    [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/tasnb6.png[/img]

hello I am currently working on my a new project corrupted-pk
(keep in mind this is going to be pvp & pvm + economy)
it’s a free to play with some members items

we have added:
-corrupt dragon weapons not armour (extremely rare npc drop or Donate for it.)
-tok-haar-kal cape you recieve once you get a 25 Killstreak
-Dungeoneering tab is pking stats & achievements (KDR, achievement list, Kills & Deaths and current killstreak)
-sara/zammy/guthix armour (gives you 15/13/10 str bonus in order from sara to guthix [best armour is saradomin]) recieve from donating.
-rune armour you get from drops from lesser demons - 0.05 drop rate on each piece.
-Grand exchange PVP [Closed off gate to go in and out] - only way in is teleporting (added pvp drops only in GE)
-added Gauntlents bronze to rune only
-Strength amulet(t) [gives 15 str bonus] and Magic amulet(t) [gives 12 mage bonus] and glory(t) gives only range bonus
-piety & smite is added I know its members only but its all good:P
-perfect combat with new hit markers
and MORE…

heres some pictures on items (more will be added later on)

Dungeoneering tab is pking stats & achievements (KDR, achievement list, Kills & Deaths)

34ec9d4.png766×502

working corrupt weapons but doesnt degrade.

23uyk4l.png766×502

tok-haar-kal cape you recieve after 25 killstreak

2vcgoev.png763×502

[size=18pt]grand exchange pvp is currently finished 100% - coded by me.[/size]

theres a lot more, i wanted to see what you guys thought so far before i put anymore work into this
if you think there should be more to be added just comment below:P

[size=24pt]theres a few glitches i have to fix with pvp before i release it:P[/size]

and if you think i should add something I would appreciate it,
i’m adding better range items right know
i added
-zammy/sara/guthix range armour example: guthix chaps
